<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/workspaces"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Lists the organization workspaces in `orgId` to which the requesting user belongs.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
